properties.description: Draap is Cyprus based but their warehouse where the meat from Romania is shipped is located in the Netherlands
properties.title: Draap Trader

properties.description: Findus meals are then available to be bought in grocery stores. A major store in the U.K. is Tesco
properties.title: Tesco
Draap Warehouse
properties.description: Draap contends they ordered horse from Romania and then shipped boxes labeled horse to Spanghero

properties.title: Spanghero
properties.description: Spanghero is a meat processing company.

properties.title: Tavola
properties.description: Factory where the frozen meals were created. Comigel uses the factory here to create the meals. This factory makes the beef lasagne meal after getting meat labeled as beef from Spanghero.

properties.title: Comigel
properties.description: Creates frozen meals for different companies. Findus uses Comigel for their beef lasagne meal. Comigel is a 3rd party supplier of frozen meals

properties.title: Findus
properties.description: Findus is a popular brand of frozen meals in Europe

properties.title: Tesco
properties.description: A major chain of grocery stores in Ireland. They stocked Findus' frozen beef lasagne meal

properties.title: Findus  to Comigel
properties.description: Findus asks Comigel for the Beef Lasagne meals.

properties.title: Spanghero  to Trader
properties.description: Spanghero contacts their trader in Cyprus for the meat. It is still yet to be known whether Spanghero asked for horsemeat and then relabeled it as beef, or whether they asked for beef and receiver horsemeat purposely mislabeled as beef.

properties.title: Comigel to Spanghero
properties.description: Comigel asks Spanghero for the beef for their meals

properties.title: Draap Trader to Slaughterhouse
properties.description: The trader contacts the Romania slaughterhouses for the order of either horse or meat.

properties.title: Slaughterhouse to Draap Warehouse
properties.description: Romanian slaughterhouse ships horse labeled as horse to Draap who has a warehouse in the Netherlands

properties.title: Draap Warehouse to Spanghero
properties.description: Draap then either sends horsemeat labeled as beef to Spanghero, or sends horsemeat labeled as horse meat
Spanghero either sends beef already mislabeled as horsemeat to the Comigel's factory Tavola, or they relabel the horsemeat as beef and send it to the factory
properties.title: Spanghero  to Tavola
Tavola to Tesco
properties.description: Findus meals are then available to be bought in grocery stores. A major store in the U.K. is Tesco

properties.title: Tavola to Tesco
properties.description: Findus meals are then available to be bought in grocery stores. A major store in the U.K. is Tesco
This shows the process of how the frozen meal acquires the beef in the meal.
properties.title: Findus' Frozen "Beef" Lasagne
